user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe with my friends next month. Can you provide me with the historical currency conversion rates for USD to EUR from the past 30 days? Additionally, I would like to know the earning calendar for the European stock exchange during our travel dates.

TaskList.description: Fetch historical currency conversion rates for USD to EUR for the last 30 days.
Retrieve the earning calendar for the European stock exchange for the dates of travel.
Compile the results of the historical currency conversion rates and the earning calendar into a summary.
